item.title: Zenless Zone Zero: Burnice Materials (Promotion, Skill & Core Skill Enhancement)
item.description:
The Outer Ring in Zenless Zone Zero is as exciting as their reputation. As an area located outside the bustling city, it emits an aura of danger and mystery. While visiting this place under the commission of the Sons of Calydon, players will witness an Ether corruption of Overlord Pompey on top of the fiery motorbike race between the Sons of Calydon and the Overlord's gang.

Both Caesar and Burnice require the drop from Overlord Pompey to level up and maximize their abilities. Here's a full list of Burnice ascension materials in ZZZ .

Burnice Materials In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

Players must collect the following Burnice ascension materials in ZZZ to maximize her stat:

  • Anomaly/Controller Certification Seal (Anomaly Materials)
  • Burn Chip (Fire Materials)
  • Higher Dimensional Data: Stealth Phantom (Normal Boss)
  • Scarlet Engine (Weekly Boss)

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero: Burnice Build Guide
item.description:
The Sons of Calydon in Zenless Zone Zero is a biker gang that does its bidding in the Outer Ring of New Eridu. This ZZZ faction looks up to Caesar as its current leader, although Caesar hasn't always been the captain of the team, as evidenced by the cameo of the old leader.

The other members of the Sons of Calydon include Lucy, Piper, Lighter, and Burnice. Burnice is known as a mixologist or bartender for the group and looks as crazy as Grace in terms of her craft. In combat, Burnice uses fire to burn enemies, causing the following Burnice builds in ZZZ to be ideal for her.

Burnice Build In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

W-Engine

Drive Discs

Drive Discs Stat

  1. Flamemaker Shaker
  2. Fusion Compiler
  3. Roaring Ride
  4. Rainforest Gourmet
  5. Sharpened Stinger
  6. Electro-Lip Gloss
  7. Weeping Gemini
  8. [Magnetic Storm] Bravo

4-pieces set:

  • Chaos Jazz
  • Freedom Blues

2-pieces set:

  • Freedom Blues
  • Chaos Jazz
  • Swing Jazz
  • Inferno Metal

  • 4 slot : Anomaly Proficiency
  • 5 slot : Fire DMG Bonus or ATK
  • 6 slot : Anomaly Mastery or Energy Regen
  • Sub-stat priority : Anomaly Proficiency > ATK% > PEN

Burnice Best Weapons In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

The best weapon for Burnice in ZZZ is Flamemaker Shaker , which enhances Energy Regen, allowing Burnice to use her EX Special Attack more often. When she uses EX Special Attack or Assist Attack, this W-Engine will also increase her DMG by up to 35%.

Burnice's core passive applies the Scorched debuff on the target. When a squad member hits the affected enemy, the Scorched effect will trigger Afterburn , dealing Fire DMG based on Burnice's ATK and accumulating Fire Anomaly. Burniceâ€™s off-field Fire DMG also synergizes with Flamemaker Shaker, where the weapon doubles the DMG boost while Burnice is off-field.

The second-best option for Burnice is Grace's signature weapon in ZZZ , Fusion Compiler . This W-Engine increases Anomaly Proficiency when the wielder uses Special Attack or EX Special Attack.

For A-Rank weapons, Burnice can use Roaring Ride or Rainforest Gourmet , both synergizing with her EX Special Attack and Energy consumption. If the two aren't available, other 4-star weapons like Electro-Lip Gloss and Weeping Gemini are viable as well. Meanwhile, new players can use [Magnetic Storm] Bravo .

Burnice Best Drive Discs In ZZZ - Zenless Zone Zero

Burnice is a quick-swap character where players would want to bring her in, consume all her Energy with an EX Special Attack, then swap her out. Because of this, she wonâ€™t take too much field time, making 4pc Chaos Jazz the perfect Drive Discs for her. 4pc Freedom Blues is also fine if Chaos Jazz isnâ€™t ready yet.

For the extra 2pc , focus on Anomaly Proficiency via Freedom Blues or Chaos Jazz until Burnice has at least 300 Anomaly Proficiency. Players can also opt for Swing Jazz for Energy Regen or Inferno Metal for Fire DMG Bonus if thatâ€™s whatâ€™s available.

Since Burnice is an Anomaly character, her 4-slot should be Anomaly Proficiency to boost her Burn damage. In 5-slot, Fire DMG Bonus is preferable, but ATK is also okay. Meanwhile, for the 6-slot, Anomaly Mastery is the best option to trigger Burn faster, but Energy Regen is also acceptable to quickly enable Burniceâ€™s EX Special Attack.

item.title: Kingdom Two Crowns: How To Repair Ship
item.description:
Kingdom Two Crowns is a cute little game that only lets you travel along the x-axis, forward and backward. The goal of the game is to create a kingdom to rule, make it prosper, and fight off the mysterious corruption invading your lands. The game has a very simple control scheme but is surprisingly in-depth in terms of mechanics and gameplay.

One of the core elements in the game is traveling to different islands and expanding your empire beyond the starting area. To do so, you need to build a ship. But, you can't just build a ship out of nothing; you need a blueprint to follow first.

Where To Find The Ship In Kingdom Two Crowns

The boat in Kingdom Two Crowns is an integral part of the game's exploration mechanics. Developing one island doesn't take too long, especially the beginning island, so being able to leave early on is important for the players to stay engaged. In fact, you'll need to explore the second island if you want to progress the main quest and destroy the portals.

The boat can be found fairly close to your initial encampment . It is a part of the background and appears as a wreckage, with the boat in multiple pieces. When you stop in front of it, you'll see a handful of coin slots show up that will let you start the repair process .

The wreckage is quite close to your starting location. If you can't find the boat, try looking on the other side of the map.

How To Repair & Use The Boat In Kingdom Two Crowns

In Kingdom Two Crowns , the repair process requires a fair sum of money to complete. To start the initial process, players need to spend 10 gold. This will begin a work order that pulls out the hull of the boat from the wreckage.

After the hull is properly set up, players need to collect a total of fifty-nine ship parts by paying two coins for each part. After spending two coins, the ship part will appear next to the player and can be used by workers to build the ship. Players will get all the ship parts alongside the initial hull replacement on the first island and only some on the second island. The total cost for repairing the ship is 128 gold coins .

If the parts are not used in time, they can be stolen by greedlings during nightly waves .

Once you've finished the construction, players can drop the ship into the water by paying two more coins . Once in the water, the ship needs to be dragged to the nearby dock, which your builders will do once they're available.

To embark on a journey , players need to pay ten coins . If you want to bring along some troops with you, you can spend coins at the wharf bell (which can be found on the dock) to summon troops from your kingdom. This will make your transition a lot easier when you disembark on the new island.

After embarking, players can choose a destination island. If you're still on the first island, you'll only be able to go to the second island. After selecting the desired island, the player will reach it and crash their ship. If you want to reach an island without crashing, you'll need to destroy the portal blocking access to the port, where you can build a lighthouse .

item.title: Zenless Zone Zero: Burnice Team Composition Guide
item.description:
With the Zenless Zone Zero version 1.2 update, players were introduced to new characters from the Sons of Calydon faction, including Caesar and Burnice, both now playable. While Caesar serves as a versatile defense character, capable of buffing and stunning, Burnice plays a different role, specializing in applying Fire Anomalyâ€”even while off-field. Her kit allows her to deal damage passively, which frees up space for an on-field character to take the spotlight while ensuring anomaly build-up. This versatility opens up numerous team composition possibilities for Burnice.

In general, Burnice benefits most from being paired with another Anomaly character or a teammate from the same faction for synergistic bonuses. However, she can also fit into more diverse teams that don't focus on Anomaly builds. Here are some of the best team compositions for Burnice.

Jane Doe + Burnice + Caesar (Red Moccus)

Considering Jane Doe is one of the few characters who thrives in a Disorder playstyle by applying two different anomalies to enemies, Burnice becomes one of her best teammates. Unlike previous options, Burnice can efficiently build Anomaly effects even while off-field, enhancing Jane's damage potential. When paired with a top-tier defensive and buffing unit like Caesar, this team gains even more resilience. Caesar ensures the team stays at high HP, even in challenging content, reducing the need for constant dodging.

However, it's important to note that assembling a team with three limited-banner characters (Jane, Burnice, and Caesar) can be quite a significant investment, which may not be accessible to many players. Fortunately, Jane is a powerful DPS unit even without Caesar. In more budget-friendly setups, players can replace Caesar with support units like Seth, who still provide ample defensive utility. In such cases, it's recommended to pair Seth with Officer Cui rather than Red Moccus to better synergize with Bangboo setups.

Team Roles

  • Jane Doe: DPS, Assault Buildup
  • Burnice: Sub-DPS, Burn Buildup
  • Caesar: DMG mitigation, buffer, debuffer, stun

Soldier 11 + Burnice + Lucy (Rocketboo)

Players who enjoy using Soldier 11 will now have an even more synergistic team with Burnice, replacing her previous best teammate, Koleda. While this setup isnâ€™t necessarily anomaly-focused, it excels in leveraging Soldier 11â€™s best Drive Disc, Inferno Metal , which requires Burn to be applied to enemies to further boost Soldier 11â€™s Crit.

With this team composition, players can create an effective mono-Fire team, consistently applying Fire DMG and rapidly inflicting Burn on enemies. This was previously a challenge with Koleda, whose kit wasnâ€™t as reliable in Burn buildup. The synergy becomes even more potent if players also have higher Mindscapes of Lucy, further enhancing this team composition. It's worth noting that, players could essentially swap Lucy with Koleda if they don't mind losing the ATK buff that benefits more Burnice and Soldier 11, or even Caesar for stronger buffs, while forgo-ing a little on the Burn Buildup.

Team Roles

  • Soldier 11: DPS
  • Burnice: Sub-DPS, Burn Buildup
  • Lucy: Support

Piper + Burnice + Lucy (Red Moccus)

Players seeking a more F2P-friendly setup with a similar playstyle to the Jane Doe team can make good use of Piper and Lucy alongside Burnice, both of whom belong to the Sons of Calydon faction. While Piperâ€™s damage potential isnâ€™t as high as Jane Doeâ€™s, she still serves as a strong on-field DPS character, consistently applying Burn and Assault Disorders to benefit the team.

It's worth noting that as with the previous team compositions, if players have access to Caesar, they can replace Lucy to significantly boost the teamâ€™s survivability and buffs, which will also greatly enhance Piperâ€™s performance.

Team Roles

  • Piper: DPS, Assault Buildup
  • Burnice: Sub-DPS, Burn Buildup
  • Lucy: Support

Grace + Burnice + Rina (Plugboo)

A solid duo Anomaly team composition for players to consider features Grace, who might not come to mind as quickly as other options when building an Anomaly-focused team with Burnice. However, this setup functions similarly to other Anomaly compositions, with Grace taking Jane Doe's spot and Rina stepping in for a support character like Lucy. Grace excels as an on-field Anomaly user, making this team particularly useful for content with Electric and Fire weaknesses, or even just Electric weakness. Burnice provides off-field support, effectively boosting the teamâ€™s DPS by allowing Grace to focus on dealing damage while Burnice applies Fire Anomaly. This synergy can make a significant difference in challenging endgame content, especially when tackling the DPS check and time limits in difficult stages like Shiyu Defense.

Rina also adds considerable value to this composition by providing a unique team-wide PEN Ratio buff, which complements Anomaly characters well, as PEN Ratio is one of the key stats they benefit from, alongside Anomaly Mastery and Proficiency. If players already have Grace and Rina, both Standard S-Rank characters, this composition is definitely worth trying, even though it may seem less straightforward or synergistic than other options at first glance.

  • Grace: DPS, Shock Buildup
  • Burnice: Sub-DPS, Burn Buildup
  • Rina: Support

item.title: Microsoft Ditches Awesome Xbox Game Pass Deal Right Before Black Ops 6 Launch
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Microsoft removed $1 Xbox Game Pass trial option for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 launch.
  • Xbox Game Pass remains a great gaming deal but facing some recent backlash.
  • Fans unhappy as Microsoft discontinues $1 trial, limiting access to Black Ops 6.

Microsoft has removed access to a potentially useful option from Xbox Game Pass less than two weeks before the launch of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 . The Xbox Game Pass subscription option might have given budget-conscious players a chance to play Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 for much less than its retail asking price.

Despite some unpopular changes to Xbox Game Pass in recent months, including a Game Pass price increase that attracted disapproval from government regulators, the service remains one of the best deals in gaming. For a relatively low monthly fee, players can enjoy a huge library of premium titles on a variety of platforms, including Xbox consoles, PCs, and on mobile via Xbox Cloud Gaming. Some of those titles include the biggest releases of the year, including the Call of Duty franchise, thanks to Microsoft's acquisition of Activision and other major players in the game publishing space.

Unfortunately, Microsoft appears to be making the deal even less appealing. According to a post by Call of Duty news account CharlieIntel, Microsoft quietly axed the option to pay just a dollar to subscribe to Xbox Game Pass on consoles for 14 days. That means that for new and lapsed members, only the Core, Standard, and Ultimate Xbox Game Pass subscription tiers are available, without a free or discounted trial option.

Xbox Game Pass $1 Subscription Deal Removed By Microsoft Ahead of Black Ops 6

The $1 Xbox Game Pass subscription option could have represented an incredible deal for players looking for a brief fling with the biggest new shooter of the year. One could, in theory, purchase the 14-day subscription, and before it expired, played through the Black Ops 6 campaign, and even enjoyed some multiplayer. Now, a player on Xbox consoles who wants to play Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 at launch will have to pay its full, $70 USD purchase price or subscribe to the full Ultimate tier for $20 USD per month.

The move was met with swift disapproval online, as fans who were already unhappy with Xbox Game Pass price hikes and changes to their entitlements saw it as another "cash grab" from Microsoft. Other fans were more pragmatic, saying that the move made business sense for Microsoft, which likely wants to maximize revenue from Black Ops 6 's launch period. A few others pointed out that the $1 subscription removal might not have affected things either way, as only Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers get access to day one releases. A $1 subscription period would likely have been only for the Standard tier, which would not have had access to Black Ops 6 on launch day.
